title: beta ImageZoomer v0.2 (test!)
body: I fixed my <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/07/01/imagezoomer_zero_dot_two_alpha_help.aspx">install.rdf issue</a> earlier today, and I've ironed out a few more bugs.  I think that <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/articles/imagezoomer.aspx">v0.2</a> has reached a state of Beta quality now.  Once the <a href="http://forums.mozillazine.org/">mozillazine forums</a> come back online, I'll post it there and let the experts try it out.  In the meantime, I'll have to CVS the stuff onto <a href="http://imagezoomer.mozdev.org/">imagezoomer.mozdev.org</a> so that my bandwidth isn't killed entirely.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-07-01
